revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=RouterStation |revision= |asin= |est_release_date=10/2008 |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=MPB-880 |type=wired embedded board |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161;AR7161-BC1A, PB5653.002C, 0835, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805DMI-20G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3S12D40ETP-G5 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,USB 2.0, |expansion_minipci_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J4 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996FC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=30V N-Channel Enahanced Mode FET;Alpha & Omega;AOD484;;1; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4468;;2; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7700;;1; ,,, High Efficiency, Synchronous Buck with Dual Linear Controllers;Richtek;RT9206;;1; |flags=GPIO |stock_boot=RedBoot;0.9.8.04;UBNT; |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT, |oui_eth=00:15:6D }} "081R-MPB880AN00 R06" is printed on a sticker attached to the bottom of the unit. :This would seem to indicate the device was manufactured by ''[[U-MEDIA]]''. :"Designed in U.S.A." is silkscreened on the top of the board. '''Note''': The PCI controller on AR7161 [https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/7759 cannot handle I/O resources].
This isn't a problem for [[Atheros]] based Wi-Fi cards, but it is generally a problem for others.. ===Links=== *[http://www.ubnt.com/wiki/RouterStation ''Ubiquiti RouterStation'' on the '''Ubiquiti''' Wiki] :The power supply voltage range is 12VDC to 24VDC. *[https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/routerstation ''Ubiquiti RouterStation'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :The device runs OpenWrt on the stock firmware. *[https://www.amazon.ae/Ubiquiti-Router-Station/dp/B07MQMTR3M ''Ubiquiti RouterStation'' on the '''Amazon'''] (AE) ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
